resources.string:
Dear Printoid developer,

Following is my own configuration:

- Device model:
[%1$s]
- Android version:
[%2$s]
- Fingerprint:
[%3$s]
- 3D Printer:
[%4$s]
- OctoPrint version:
[%5$s]

My message:


%6$s


Best regards
Before contacting the developer, please meet the following conditions:
I have read the Frequently Asked Questions (F.A.Q.)
I will be polite and courteous
Please write your message to Anthony, the developer of Printoid:
Hello, I\'m coming to you because…
The failing connection logs will be automatically added to your message to the developer, still respecting your privacy.
Hello, I will explain you my context (is it the first time I try to connect OctoPrint using Printoid? Was it working well previously? …)
